post:
Hey LET,

Since October 2014, FixedRoute has provided dedicated IP VPN services in New York City and Seattle.  **We're now launching in Atlanta!**. This all runs over OpenVPN, and we even bundle a free Viscosity license for you to use (usually $9 alone), as their software is significantly more user friendly than the standard OpenVPN client.

> **Our Offer - Valid until 00:00 GMT 1st April 2015**

>* **Atlanta - 5TB/year bandwidth - [Order for $10/year](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=14&promocode=ATLANTALAUNCH5)**
>* **Atlanta - 10TB/year bandwidth - [Order for $15/year](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=13&promocode=ATLANTALAUNCH10)**
>* New York City - 10TB/year bandwidth - [Order for $20/year](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)
>* Seattle - 10TB/year bandwidth - [Order for $20/year](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=10)

You'll get your own IP address to use with this service, and can open up to 5 ports. Setup time on these packages is up to 48 hours, so please be patient.

If you've any questions, I'll be around here to answer them.

Thanks!

>* Follow us on [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/fixedroutevpn)
>* Like us on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/fixedroute)
>* Visit our [Website](http://www.fixedroute.com)

_NOTE: Offers for this service have been approved by Maarten._
